mapper.select: INSERT INTO hairweb.qna (QnA_title, QnA_preface, QnA_writer, QnA_body) VALUES ( #{QnA_title}, #{QnA_preface}, #{QnA_writer}, #{QnA_body} );
SELECT d.dname,a.answer_body FROM hairweb.answer a, hairweb.designer d WHERE a.designer_no=d.dnum and a.qna_no=#{qna_no};
SELECT itemname FROM hairweb.item where itemprice=#{itemprice};
SELECT s.*, p.name as 'professor' FROM student s, professor p WHERE s.professor_id = p.professor_id
SELECT * FROM course WHERE course_id in ( SELECT course_id FROM enroll WHERE student_id = #{student_id} ) GROUP BY course_name

SELECT o.example1, o.example2, o.example3, o.example4, o.question_answer, q.* FROM ObjectiveQuestion o, QuickPollQuestion q WHERE q.question_type = 2 AND q.course_id = #{course_id} AND q.question_id = o.objective_question_id
SELECT s.question_answer, q.* FROM SubjectiveQuestion s, QuickPollQuestion q WHERE q.question_type = 3 AND q.course_id = #{course_id} AND q.question_id = s.subjective_question_id
